instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under QUICK SETTINGS , tap Display . Tap Brightness . Move the slider to adjust brightness level as necessary and then tap OK .
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under QUICK SETTINGS , tap Display . Tap Screen timeout . Tap to select the timeout setting.

Navigate to the desired home screen where the widget or shortcut will be added. Touch and hold on a vacant area on the screen that is large enough to hold the item. Tap Widgets . Touch and hold the item to add. Drag your finger to move the item to the desired location on the home screen. Release your finger
Touch and hold on the desired home screen. Tap Wallpapers . Tap Home and lock screens . Select an image from the bottom of screen or tap More images . Tap the image to use. Tap Set wallpaper
Touch and hold on the desired home screen. Tap Wallpapers . Tap Lock screen . Select an image from the bottom of screen or tap More images . Tap the image to use. Tap Set wallpaper .
